cause.description:
Interfamily relationships are vulgar. We are here to help these families break from there long tradition and date other people. Any donations will be used to attempt to stop inbreeding. Just Use Suitable Tendencies Inbreeding Never (JUSTIN). JUSTIN will provide the assets to stop this horrible epidemic.
1. Because of inbreeding, Arkansas and AIDS still exist.
2. Because of inbreeding, taxes are raising and jobs and going over seas.
cause.mission: Hault the reproductive tendencies between family members
cause.name: Stop Inbreeding NOW!!!
